sweets.name: Gulab Jamun
sweets.description: Soft, spongy, milk-solid based sweet balls soaked in a rose-scented sugar syrup. A classic Indian dessert.

sweets.name: Rasgulla
sweets.description: Cottage cheese balls boiled in light sugar syrup. Light, juicy, and famous across Eastern India.

sweets.name: Kaju Katli
sweets.description: Diamond-shaped cashew fudge (barfi) made with cashews, sugar, and cardamom powder. Finished with edible silver foil.

sweets.name: Orange Delight Roll
sweets.description: A dense, rich roll of milk solids and orange zest, offering a refreshing citrus flavor.

sweets.name: Chocolate Barfi
sweets.description: A creamy, decadent milk fudge mixed with rich cocoa powder, creating a perfect blend of Indian tradition and Western flavor.

sweets.name: Jalebi
sweets.description: Crispy, deep-fried spirals of fermented batter soaked in sugar syrup. Best served warm.

sweets.name: Peda
sweets.description: Thick semi-soft fudge made from khoa (milk solids) with cardamom flavor. A staple offering.

sweets.name: Malai Chop
sweets.description: Flattened pieces of cottage cheese soaked in malai (clotted cream) and flavored with saffron.

sweets.name: Mysore Pak
sweets.description: A rich, porous fudge made from chickpea flour, sugar, and generous amounts of ghee (clarified butter).

sweets.name: Coconut Ladoo
sweets.description: Round sweets made from grated coconut, condensed milk, and cardamom. Perfect festive treat.

sweets.name: Ras Malai
sweets.description: Soft cottage cheese patties dipped in sweetened, thickened milk flavored with saffron and pistachios.

sweets.name: Motichoor Ladoo
sweets.description: Small, bead-like boondi pearls lightly bound together with sugar syrup and ghee. Delicate texture.

sweets.name: Anjeer Barfi
sweets.description: A premium, rich barfi made primarily from figs (anjeer), dates, and mixed nuts, often containing no added sugar.

sweets.name: Chocolate Truffle
sweets.description: Rich, dense chocolate ganache spheres dusted with cocoa powder.

sweets.name: Kesar Peda
sweets.description: Classic peda infused with high-quality saffron (kesar) for color and aroma.
